'''Beta 1.20.0.25''' (Android) or '''Preview 1.20.0.25''' (Windows, iOS, iPadOS, Xbox) is the sixth and final beta/''Preview'' version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.20.0]], released on May 18, 2023<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/15888692383757|title=Minecraft Beta & Preview - 1.20.0.25|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=May 18, 2023}}</ref>, which fixes bugs.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=1.20.0.25 Preview
|;old
|168409|{{cd|BlockPermutation.matches()}} and {{cd|blockPermutation.withProperty()}} methods do not work with custom blocks. Script API.
|168908|Minecraft for chromebook cursor sensitivity.
|;From the 1.20.0 development versions
|169504|Aiming in circle mode is not properly focused.
|170070|Teleporting players to unloaded chunks while flying causes the fly mode to get disabled.
|170643|Cherry Grove biome option is missing
}}</onlyinclude>
